      • supports

        boolean supports(STContext context,
               Resource resource)
                 throws STRuntimeException
        Checks if this action supports running on the resource
        Parameters:
        context - Context
        resource - Resource
        Returns:
        True if the action supports running on the resource and it's environment.
        Throws:
        STRuntimeException - If an error occurs
        See Also:
        getAlternative()

      • getOrder

      • getType

      • getAlternative

        java.lang.String getAlternative()
        Return the alternative id. If any action on a resource has a non-null alternative value, this means that it will expect at least of the actions of that id to be supported (meaning that supports(com.kloudtek.systyrant.STContext, Resource) has returned true).
        Returns:
        Alternative id or null if not an alternative
        See Also:
        supports(com.kloudtek.systyrant.STContext, Resource)
